entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dome Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of snow. High minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
